questionable_claims.reason: Unusually high claim amount ($12,500) for a minor fender bender with no reported injuries.
Third property damage claim filed by this policyholder within 6 months, all with similar circumstances.
Vague incident description lacking specific details; claim filed exactly one day before policy expiration.
Claimed items' value significantly exceeds documented proof of purchase; inconsistencies in theft report timing.

referral_report.summary: This claim represents the third property damage claim filed by the same policyholder within a 6-month period, all with remarkably similar circumstances and damage descriptions.
referral_report.additional_information: Policyholder has filed claims on 02/15/2023, 04/22/2023, and now 07/18/2023, each involving reported damage to external property structures during nighttime hours with no witnesses. Total claimed amount across all three incidents is $27,450. Recommend reviewing previous claim documentation and photographs for pattern analysis and conducting an in-person interview with the claimant to clarify circumstances.
